comment:
>>37735883

"Yeah. Let's fight some cave monsters before we dig too deep, eh?" You suggest. "Get a feel for our group dynamic."

"Sure." Nel responds. "Thinking ahead."

"I like." Rhett says. Tatsumaki just smiles and nods.

"I'm good for whatevs." Vision shrugs.

The five of you head out of the city, staying close together as you follow a series of spiraling caves downward, beneath Averron City. Below, it's noticeably colder, and bridges are shrouded by the white fog you saw from above.

"Low visibility here." Nel seems to have straightened up a bit. He's walking cautiously, knives drawn. "This route leads down to the ruins, but there's an area below that widens up where we should find some monsters, as well as a few spider caves if you're feeling up to it."

"Gotcha. By the by," You say, "Have you guys talked to the fortune teller in town? The consultations are interesting. He told me there might even be a Celestial Altar down here."

"Woah, woah. Really?" Nel halts and turns on a heel. "What if it's a Greater, like the one in the city?"

> [[ 1/2 ]]
name: BSO
